meanings.definition: A strip of fabric or plastic with a person's name printed or embroidered on it, typically used for identification purposes.
meanings.sent1: I sewed my nametapes onto my school bag to make sure it doesn't get lost.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers wore nametapes on their uniforms so they could be easily recognized.
meanings.sent3: The nametapes on my socks decided to go on an adventure without me!
meanings.sent4: Her nametapes were like tiny flags waving her identity for all to see.
meanings.sent5: The bright nametapes stood out in the sea of identical backpacks.

meanings.definition: To affix a nametape to a piece of clothing or equipment.
meanings.sent1: I carefully nametaped my jacket before the camping trip.
meanings.sent2: She always nametapes her tools to avoid mix-ups at work.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf nametaped the wrong label on purpose!
meanings.sent4: He nametapes his memories onto the walls of his mind.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic deftly nametapes the serial number onto the engine part.
